ing: 4 cooked chorizo links, cut into 1/2-inch slices
5 cloves garlic, slivered, or to taste
des: "This is an amazing appetizer, which will be eaten in seconds. I can never seem to make enough. Everyone loves them and asks me to make every time."
ins:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Place a chorizo piece and a few garlic slivers inside each date. Close each date using a toothpick. Arrange the stuffed dates on a baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven until heated through, about 10 minutes.
